content: preferred elastic bind off repeat garter section 58 knit 2 stitches then insert the left needle into the front of the 2 stitches on the right eyelet section 2 needle and k2togtbl knit another stitch row 1 rs k1 yo k to last 2 sts k2tog k2togtbl the 2 stitches on the right needle row 2 ws sl1 p to last 2 sts kfb k1 and repeat to the end row 3 k1 yo k7 k2tog yo x 2 ssk k4 x 6 k1 k2tog sew in ends and wet block i recommend row 4 sl1 p6 k1 p7 x 6 p2 kfb k1 aggressively pinning out the border eyelets 60 styling tip repeat garter section 63 you can pull the stockinette tip into one of the border eyelets to secure this piece your eyelet section 3 neck row 1 rs k1 yo k to last 2 sts k2tog row 2 ws sl1 p to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 3 k1 yo k5 k2tog yo x 2 ssk k4 x 7 k2tog row 4 sl1 p5 k1 p7 x 7 kfb k1 65 © rebecca dahlberg 2018 embark shawlette abbreviations/key k knit kfb knit into the front and the back k2tog knit 2 together k2togtbl knit 2 together through the back loops p purl rs right side sl slip purlwise ssk slip slip knit sts stitches ws wrong side yo yarn over get in touch feedback and questions are welcome email rebeccadahls@gmail com raverly id rebeccadahls instagram @revelinstitches tech editing by aersknits © rebecca dahlberg 2018
